test-set.name: prod-RequireProhibitFeature
test-set.description: Tests for the require-feature and prohibit-feature options.

test-case.name: require-schema-aware-1-s
test-case.description: An error must be thrown if the feature is not supported.

modified.change: Duplicating tests depending on feature support.

test-case.description: An error must be thrown if the feature is not supported.

modified.change: Duplicating tests depending on feature support.

test-case.description: An error must be thrown if the feature is not supported.

modified.change: Duplicating tests depending on feature support.

test-case.test: declare option require-feature "typed-data-schemas"; (validate lax { <element xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xsi:type="xs:integer">42</element> }) instance of element(*, xs:integer)

test-case.description: An error must be thrown if the feature is not recognized.

test-case.description: Features must be lexical QNames.

test-case.description: Features must be lexical QNames.

test-case.description: The prefix of a feature must be bound.

test-case.name: require-typed-data-1-s
test-case.description: An error must be thrown if the feature is required but not supported.

test-case.name: require-typed-data-1-ns
test-case.description: An error must be thrown if the feature is required but not supported.

test-case.name: require-typed-data-2-s
test-case.description: An error must be thrown if the feature is required but not supported.

test-case.description: An error must be thrown if the feature is required but not supported.

test-case.name: require-typed-data-3-s
test-case.description: Data must be typed if the typed-data feature is supported.
test-case.test: import module namespace module = "http://www.w3.org/XQueryTest/ProducesTypedData"; module:nine() le module:ten()

test-case.name: require-typed-data-3-ns
test-case.description: Data must be untyped if the typed-data feature is not supported.
test-case.test: import module namespace module = "http://www.w3.org/XQueryTest/ProducesTypedData"; module:nine() le module:ten()

test-case.name: prohibit-typed-data-1-s
test-case.description: An error must be thrown if the typed data feature cannot be prohibited.

test-case.name: prohibit-typed-data-1-ns
test-case.description: Prohibiting typed-data must work if it is not supported.

test-case.name: prohibit-typed-data-2-s
test-case.description: Data must be untyped if the feature is deactivated.

test-case.name: prohibit-typed-data-2-ns
test-case.description: Data must be untyped if the feature is not supported.

test-case.name: prohibit-typed-data-3-s
test-case.description: Prohibiting typed data must trigger prohibiting schema awareness.

test-case.name: prohibit-typed-data-3-ns
test-case.description: Prohibiting typed data must trigger prohibiting schema awareness.

test-case.name: prohibit-typed-data-4-s
test-case.description: Prohibiting typed data must trigger prohibiting schema awareness.
test-case.test: declare option prohibit-feature "typed-data"; (validate lax { <element xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xsi:type="xs:integer">42</element> }) instance of element(*, xs:integer)

test-case.name: prohibit-typed-data-4-ns
test-case.description: Prohibiting typed data must trigger prohibiting schema awareness.
test-case.test: declare option prohibit-feature "typed-data"; (validate lax { <element xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xsi:type="xs:integer">42</element> }) instance of element(*, xs:integer)

test-case.name: require-typed-data-4-s
test-case.description: Requiring schema awareness must trigger requiring typed data.

test-case.name: require-typed-data-4-ns
test-case.description: Requiring schema awareness must trigger requiring typed data.

test-case.name: require-typed-data-prohibit-schemas-1-s
test-case.description: Requiring schema awareness must trigger requiring typed data.

test-case.name: require-typed-data-prohibit-schemas-1-sns
test-case.description: Requiring schema awareness must trigger requiring typed data.

test-case.name: require-typed-data-prohibit-schemas-1-ns
test-case.description: Requiring schema awareness must trigger requiring typed data.

test-case.name: require-schema-aware-5-s
test-case.description: An error must be thrown if the feature is not supported.
test-case.test: declare option require-feature "typed-data-all-optional-features"; (validate lax { <element xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xsi:type="xs:integer">42</element> }) instance of element(*, xs:integer)

test-case.name: require-schema-aware-5-ns
test-case.description: An error must be thrown if the feature is not supported.
test-case.test: declare option require-feature "typed-data-all-optional-features"; (validate lax { <element xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xsi:type="xs:integer">42</element> }) instance of element(*, xs:integer)

test-case.name: prohibit-schema-aware-3-s
test-case.description: An error must be thrown if the feature is prohibited and used.
test-case.test: declare option prohibit-feature "typed-data-all-optional-features"; (validate lax { <element xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xsi:type="xs:integer">42</element> }) instance of element(*, xs:integer)

test-case.name: prohibit-schema-aware-3-ns
test-case.description: An error must be thrown if the feature is prohibited and used.
test-case.test: declare option prohibit-feature "typed-data-all-optional-features"; (validate lax { <element xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xsi:type="xs:integer">42</element> }) instance of element(*, xs:integer)
